Sasuke first hits the opponent into the air. Orochimaru spits his [[Kusanagi]] to Sasuke, and it slashes the opponent on the way. Sasuke grabs the Kusanagi with his free hand and jumps towards the opponent, slicing them repeatedly with his and Orochimaru's swords.

[[pt-br:Dupla Calma de Kusanagi]]
